org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker

Interface TokenEventListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TokenTrackerSerializer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Log4jTokenTrackerSerializer

    public interface TokenEventListener
    All token events gathered by TokenTracker can be listened by implementations of this interface.

    • Method Detail

      • initToken

        void initToken(java.util.Date date,
             java.lang.String componentId,
             TokenContent token)
        New token was created in a component.
        Parameters:
        date - time stamp of the event
        componentId - component id where the token was created
        token - content of token

      • freeToken

        void freeToken(java.util.Date date,
             java.lang.String componentId,
             TokenContent token)
        Given token is release in a component. No other events for this token are expected.
        Parameters:
        date - time stamp of the event
        componentId - component id where the token was released
        token - content of token

      • readToken

        void readToken(java.util.Date date,
             java.lang.String componentId,
             int inputPort,
             TokenContent token)
        Token was read by a component.
        Parameters:
        date - time stamp of the event
        componentId - component id where the token was read
        inputPort - input port index where the token was read
        token - content of token

      • writeToken

        void writeToken(java.util.Date date,
              java.lang.String componentId,
              int outputPort,
              TokenContent token)
        Token was written by a component.
        Parameters:
        date - time stamp of the event
        componentId - component id where the token was written
        outputPort - output port index where the token was written
        token - content of token

      • linkTokens

        void linkTokens(java.util.Date date,
              java.lang.String componentId,
              TokenContent sourceToken,
              TokenContent targetToken)
        Two given token are considered in parent-child relationship.
        Parameters:
        date - time stamp of the event
        componentId - component id where two tokens was linked
        sourceToken - parent token
        targetToken - child token

      • executeJob

        void executeJob(java.util.Date date,
              java.lang.String componentId,
              TokenContent token,
              JobType jobType,
              IAuthorityProxy.RunStatus runStatus)
        Token executes a job
        Parameters:
        date - time stamp of the event
        componentId - component id where the token executes a job
        token - caused token
        jobType - type of executed job
        runId - run id of executed job
        settings - custom settings of executed job

      • jobFinished

        void jobFinished(java.util.Date date,
               java.lang.String componentId,
               TokenContent token,
               JobType jobType,
               IAuthorityProxy.RunStatus runStatus)
        Token reports a job is finished.
        Parameters:
        date - time stamp of the event
        componentId - component id where the job was finished
        token - reported token
        jobType - type of finished job
        runId - run id of finished job
        result - custom information about finished job

      • logMessage

        void logMessage(java.util.Date date,
              java.lang.String componentId,
              TokenContent token,
              org.apache.log4j.Level level,
              java.lang.String message,
              java.lang.String exception)
        Token reports a message
        Parameters:
        date - time stamp of the event
        componentId - component id where the message is reported
        token - reported token
        level - logging level
        message - reported message
        exception - reported exception
